thread.title: U.S. stocks open lower, on track to post steep weekly losses
thread.title_full: U.S. stocks open lower, on track to post steep weekly losses - MarketWatch

author: Anora Mahmudova
title: U.S. stocks open lower, on track to post steep weekly losses
text:
U.S. stocks extended this week's losses with a renewed selloff on Friday. The main indexes are on track to post the steepest weekly declines since last May 2012. The S&P 500 SPX, -1.38% opened 19 points, or 0.9%, lower at 2,016. The benchmark index fell below a 200-day moving average on Thursday, a key technical level. The Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, -1.32% dropped 165 points, or 1%, to 16,824. The Nasdaq Composite COMP, -1.66% began the day down 70 points, or 1.4%, to 4,707.
Read the full story: U.S. stocks see fresh pain; eyes biggest weekly decline of year
